name: Currying Flavors
description:
Currying Flavors: A Pun-geon Adventure is a short escape-room / puzzle game in a strange dungeon.

Trigger Warning: It's full of puns.

Cook food and make your way out of this underground village, full of hungry villagers, before it's time for your execution.

Item interaction:

  • Look at objects to target.
  • Push E key to interact.
  • Push ESC key to quit the game.

Cooking:

  • Drag and drop ingredients from item list (right menu) to the cut/mix window (left menu).
  • Hit Cut/Mix button to cook.
